p: Considering the presence of phenolic compounds and understanding that these phytochemicals may be associated with antioxidant activity, the antioxidant potential of each of the six C. alnifolia extracts was analysed using four assays: total antioxidant capacity (TAC), DPPH (2,2-diphenyl-1-picryl-hydrazyl-hydrate) free radical method, reducing power test, and superoxide scavenging activity.
